Paste the columns of several tsvFiles into one tsvfile in one pass. /// Cant to more than the limit in one pass. ///.

Parameters:
out_fileName filename of the output tsvfile. ///
in_tsv_fileNames vector of input tsvfile names. ///
in_header_fileNames vector of names to put in header. /// (This is needed for the final multi-pass case.) ///
seg_max_lines If non-zero, split the output file into segments. (0=>no segments.) ///
key_col_name Key column name to match while pasting. (""=> no key column.) ///
verbose The verbosity level
